wobani.toolbox

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.toolbox.Utility

  • public class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
    Useful static methods for logging, creating various matrices etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  Utility.ShadowMapMatrixSolver
      This class can compute the main directional light's projection view matrix for shadow mapping.

    • Method Detail

      • getWobaniLogger

        @NotNull
public static java.util.logging.Logger getWobaniLogger()
        Returns the engine's root logger. You get the same result if call Logger.getLogger("wobani").
        Returns:
        the engine's root logger

      • setLoggingLevel

        public static void setLoggingLevel(@NotNull
                                   java.util.logging.Level level)
        Sets the logging level for the engine's root logger and all of it's handlers to the given value.

        Severe: exceptions, OpenGL high severity messages

        Warning: OpenGL medium severity messages

        Info: OpenGL low severity messages and system wide events like new frame computation started etc.

        Fine: Events inconnection with resources

        Finer: Computation intensive tasks

        Finest: Not too important events

        Parameters:
        level - logging level
        See Also:
        getWobaniLogger()

      • initializeLogging

        public static void initializeLogging()
        Initializes the engine's root logger and the exception logger.

      • computePerspectiveProjectionMatrix

        @NotNull
public static org.joml.Matrix4f computePerspectiveProjectionMatrix(float fov,
                                                                             float nearPlane,
                                                                             float farPlane)
        Returns the perspective projection matrix based on the given values.
        Parameters:
        fov - vertical field of view (in degrees)
        nearPlane - near plane
        farPlane - far plane
        Returns:
        perspective projection matrix
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - fov must be in the (1;179) interval, the near plane must be higher than 0 and the far plane higher than the near plane

      • computeOrthographicProjectionMatrix

        @NotNull
public static org.joml.Matrix4f computeOrthographicProjectionMatrix(float scale,
                                                                              float nearPlane,
                                                                              float farPlane)
        Returns the orthographic projection matrix based on the given values.
        Parameters:
        scale - scale
        nearPlane - near plane
        farPlane - far plane
        Returns:
        orthographic projection matrix
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - scale must be higher than 0, the near plane must be higher than 0 and the far plane higher than the near plane

      • computeShadowMapProjectionViewMatrix

        @NotNull
public static org.joml.Matrix4f computeShadowMapProjectionViewMatrix(@NotNull
                                                                               GameObject dirLight,
                                                                               float distance,
                                                                               float nearDistance,
                                                                               float farDistance)
        Computes the main directional light's projection view matrix for shadow mapping.
        Parameters:
        dirLight - the directional light's GameObject
        distance - distance from the camera frustum center
        nearDistance - near plane distance
        farDistance - far plane distance
        Returns:
        the main directional light's projection view matrix
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - dirLight can't be null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - all parameters must be positive and nearDistance must be lower than farDistance

      • toRadians

        public static float toRadians(float angle)
        Converts an angle measured in degrees to an approximately equivalent angle measured in radians. The conversion from degrees to radians is generally inexact.
        Parameters:
        angle - an angle, in degrees
        Returns:
        the measurement of the angle angdeg in radians.

      • toRadians

        @NotNull
public static org.joml.Vector3f toRadians(@NotNull
                                                    org.joml.Vector3f angles)
        Converts the given vector's all coordinates from degrees to radians.
        Parameters:
        angles - vector contains angles in degrees
        Returns:
        vector contains angles in radians

      • toDegrees

        public static float toDegrees(float angle)
        Converts an angle measured in radians to an approximately equivalent angle measured in degrees. The conversion from radians to degrees is generally inexact; users should not expect cos(toRadians(90.0)) to exactly equal 0.0.
        Parameters:
        angle - an angle, in radians
        Returns:
        the measurement of the angle angrad in degrees.

      • toDegrees

public static org.joml.Vector3f toDegrees(@NotNull
                                                    org.joml.Vector3f angles)
        Converts the given vector's all coordinates from radians to degrees.
        Parameters:
        angles - vector contains angles in radians
        Returns:
        vector contains angles in degrees
